comment: Set these from information on https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me page for your application.
bot.token can be overwritten by the DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN environment variable.
bot.client_id can be overwritten by the DISCORD_CLIENT_ID environment variable.
bot.client_secret can be overwritten by the DISCORD_CLIENT_SECRET environment variable.
bot.bot_permissions can be overwritten by the DISCORD_BOT_PERMISSIONS environment variable, but probably shouldn't be.

dispatch.comment: What character determines a given message is a command to the bot

diceroller.comment: default dice specification, used when no specification is given.
